fields.name: Subsequence Permutation
fields.description: Just sort the string and return the number of indices where the characters do not match with original string s.

fields.name: Apartments
fields.description: Give the smallest size to the person with the smallest desire!

fields.name: Ferris Wheel
fields.description: What about  the case when weight of 4 children is 2 2 8 8..and x = 10.

fields.name: Concert Tickets
fields.description: Just use multiset(el) to know the closest value and dont forget to erase it from set using el.erase(el.find(a)). to erase only one occurence of a.

fields.name: Movie Festival
fields.description: You should watch the movie which ends early! Then check if we can watch the next movie or not..

fields.name: Stick Lengths
fields.description: Sort the sticks then we will try to make every stick as long as the middle one. Do you have three friends in a straight street then where you will meet to save fuel?

fields.name: Missing Coin Sum
fields.description: Sort , observe that we can make every sum upto the max sum of coins taken from starting , if we encounter a coin which is greater than our sum then we will miss that max sum.

fields.name: Traffic Lights
fields.description: By adding a traffic light we are just dividing a length into two parts , maintain a multiset of distances..

fields.name: Ezzat and Two Subsequences
fields.description: Sort and think where to put elements. what is the answer for -  1 1 5 case!

fields.name: Moamen and k-subarrays
fields.description: Check if two adjacent elements in sorted array are also adjacent in original array or not!

fields.name: Exclusion-Inclusion
fields.description: You can always take top k elements!

fields.name: Parity Sort
fields.description: There can never be an odd to even transfer possible.
